TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HttpWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class HttpWebResponse Inherits WebResponse Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class HttpWebResponse : System::Net::WebResponse, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 提供 类的 HTTP 特定的实现。

span.span: Provides an HTTP-specific implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含支持的属性和方法的 HTTP 特定使用类。This class contains support for HTTP-specific uses of the properties and methods of the class. 类用于生成 HTTP 独立客户端应用程序发送 HTTP 请求和接收 HTTP 响应。The class is used to build HTTP stand-alone client applications that send HTTP requests and receive HTTP responses. > [!NOTE] > 不要混淆与类，但 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用，并通过 ASP 公开其方法和属性。NET 的内部函数`Response`对象。Do not confuse with the class that is used in ASP.NET applications and whose methods and properties are exposed through ASP.NET's intrinsic `Response` object. 你应永远不会直接创建的实例类。You should never directly create an instance of the class. 请改用通过调用返回的实例。Instead, use the instance returned by a call to . 您必须调用或方法来关闭响应并释放重用的连接。You must call either the or the method to close the response and release the connection for reuse. 不需要请同时调用和，但这样做因此不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 返回从 Internet 资源的通用标头信息公开为类的属性。Common header information returned from the Internet resource is exposed as properties of the class. 请参阅下表有关的完整列表。See the following table for a complete list. 其他标头可以读取从属性作为名称/值对。Other headers can be read from the property as name/value pairs. 下表显示可通过属性的常见 HTTP 标头类。The following table shows the common HTTP headers that are available through properties of the class. |HeaderHeader|PropertyProperty| |------------|--------------| |Content-EncodingContent-Encoding|| |Content-LengthContent-Length|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |Last-ModifiedLast-Modified|| |服务器Server|| 来自 Internet 资源的响应的内容返回为通过调用方法。The contents of the response from the Internet resource are returned as a by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例返回从。The following example returns an from an . [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个值，描述响应的字符集。The property contains a value that describes the character set of the response. 该字符集信息来自与响应一起返回的标头。This character set information is taken from the header returned with the response. ## Examples 下面的示例获取响应的字符集。The following example obtains the character set of the response. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭响应流。

span.span: Closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法关闭响应流并释放通过其他请求重用的资源的连接。The method closes the response stream and releases the connection to the resource for reuse by other requests. 您必须调用或方法来关闭的流并释放重用的连接。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 不需要请同时调用和，但这样做因此不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 无法关闭的流可能会导致你的应用程序耗尽连接。Failure to close the stream can cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何关闭。The following example demonstrates how to close a . [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CPP/httpwebresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CS/httpwebresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/VB/httpwebresponse_close.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与此响应关联的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookies that are associated with this response.
A that contains the cookies that are associated with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的实例包含与此响应关联的 cookie 的类。The property provides an instance of the class that holds the cookies associated with this response. 如果属性关联的是`null`、属性也将`null`。If the property of the associated is `null`, the property will also be `null`. 由服务器发送任何 cookie 信息可在属性，但是。Any cookie information sent by the server will be available in the property, however. ## Examples 下面的示例将请求发送到 URL，并显示在响应中返回的 cookie。The following example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

The contents of the specified header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用检索特定标头的内容。Use to retrieve the contents of particular headers. 必须指定你想要返回的标头。You must specify which header you want to return. ## Examples 此示例创建 Web 请求和响应的查询。This example creates a Web request and queries for a response. 如果该站点要求身份验证，此示例将使用质询字符串响应。If the site requires authentication, this example will respond with a challenge string. 使用提取此字符串。This string is extracted using . [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/CPP/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/CS/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/VB/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetResponseStream () As Stream

summary.span: 获取流，该流用于读取来自服务器的响应的体。

span.span: Gets the stream that is used to read the body of the response from the server.
A containing the body of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从请求的 Internet 资源返回数据流。The method returns the data stream from the requested Internet resource. > [!NOTE] > 您必须调用或方法来关闭的流并释放重用的连接。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 不需要请同时调用和，但这样做因此不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 未能关闭的流将导致你的应用程序耗尽连接。Failure to close the stream will cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用返回实例用于读取来自服务器的响应。The following example demonstrates how to use to return the instance used to read the response from the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CPP/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CS/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/VB/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.vb#1)]

span.span: There is no response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是包含与响应一起返回的 HTTP 标头值的名称/值对的集合。The property is a collection of name/value pairs that contain the HTTP header values returned with the response. 返回从 Internet 资源的通用标头信息公开的属性作为类。Common header information returned from the Internet resource is exposed as properties of the class. 下表列出了 API 公开为属性的公共标头。The following table lists common headers that the API exposes as properties. |HeaderHeader|PropertyProperty| |------------|--------------| |Content-EncodingContent-Encoding|| |Content-LengthContent-Length|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |Last-ModifiedLast-Modified|| |服务器Server|| ## Examples 下面的示例将所有响应标头的内容写入控制台。The following example writes the contents of all of the response headers to the console. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/CPP/httpwebresponse_headers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/CS/httpwebresponse_headers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/VB/httpwebresponse_headers.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取最后一次修改响应内容的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the last date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

value.span: ，包含修改响应内容的日期和时间。

span.span: A that contains the date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含与响应一起收到的上次修改标头的值。The property contains the value of the Last-Modified header received with the response. 日期和时间将假定为本地时间。The date and time are assumed to be local time. ## Examples 此示例将创建和响应的查询。This example creates an and queries for a response. 然后，此示例将检查请求的实体是否已被修改今天的某个时间。This example then checks whether the entity requested had been modified any time today. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_LastModified#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_LastModified/CPP/httpwebresponse_lastmodified.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_LastModified#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_LastModified/CS/httpwebresponse_lastmodified.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_LastModified#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_LastModified/VB/httpwebresponse_lastmodified.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回用于返回响应的方法。 returns the method that is used to return the response. 常见的 HTTP 方法是 GET、 HEAD、 POST、 PUT 和 DELETE。Common HTTP methods are GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, and DELETE. ## Examples 下面的示例检查字符串中包含，以确定所调用的 Web 服务器的 Http 方法。The following example checks the string contained in , to determine the Http method invoked by the Web server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Method_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Method_Server/CPP/httpwebresponse_method_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Method_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Method_Server/CS/httpwebresponse_method_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Method_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Method_Server/VB/httpwebresponse_method_server.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取响应中使用的 HTTP 协议的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the HTTP protocol that is used in the response.

value.span: 一个 ，包含响应的 HTTP 协议版本。

span.span: A that contains the HTTP protocol version of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含发送的 Internet 资源的响应的 HTTP 协议版本号。The property contains the HTTP protocol version number of the response sent by the Internet resource. ## Examples 此示例将创建，将查询来。This example creates an and queries for an . 该示例然后检查以查看服务器是否正在响应使用相同的版本。The example then checks to see if the server is responding with the same version. public: virtual property Uri ^ ResponseUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取响应请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

value.span: 响应此请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实际响应请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。The property contains the URI of the Internet resource that actually responded to the request. 此 URI 不可能相同最初请求的 URI，如果原始服务器将请求重定向。This URI might not be the same as the originally requested URI, if the original server redirected the request. 属性将使用的内容位置标头，如果存在。The property will use the Content-Location header if present. 应用程序需要访问最后一个重定向应使用属性而非，因为使用属性可能会打开安全漏洞。Applications that need to access the last redirected should use the property rather than , since the use of property may open security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 此示例将创建，将查询来和随后将检查以查看服务器是否进行了重定向的原始 URI。This example creates a and queries for an and then checks to see whether the original URI was redirected by the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CPP/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CS/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/VB/httpwebresponse_responseuri.vb#1)]
